00019 CCL_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00020 
00021 /* Conversion Nodes */
00022 
00023 __device void svm_node_convert(ShaderData *sd, float *stack, uint type, uint from, uint to)
00024 {
00025     switch(type) {
00026         case NODE_CONVERT_FV: {
00027             float f = stack_load_float(stack, from);
00028             stack_store_float3(stack, to, make_float3(f, f, f));
00029             break;
00030         }
00031         case NODE_CONVERT_CF: {
00032             float3 f = stack_load_float3(stack, from);
00033             float g = linear_rgb_to_gray(f);
00034             stack_store_float(stack, to, g);
00035             break;
00036         }
00037         case NODE_CONVERT_VF: {
00038             float3 f = stack_load_float3(stack, from);
00039             float g = (f.x + f.y + f.z)*(1.0f/3.0f);
00040             stack_store_float(stack, to, g);
00041             break;
00042         }
00043 
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 CCL_NAMESPACE_END
